articles.title: Asian Champions Trophy: Full list of title winners - Khel Now
articles.description: India overturned a two-goal deficit to beat Malaysia and lift the Asian Champions Trophy 2023 trophy becoming the first team in the tournament history to win four titles.
articles.content: In an exhilarating final encounter, the Indian mens hockey team emerged victorious over Malaysia in the Asian Champions Trophy 2023. Despite trailing by a score of 3-1 after the second quarter, the r… [+5537 chars]
